parameters.sqlQuery:
SELECT
  status
FROM
  `itr-aimasteryhub-lab.n8n.image_state`
WHERE
  userID = '{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.events[0].source.userId }}'
ORDER BY
  createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
